channel.title: [PI] Run.bat java error not solved
channel.description:
First of all my server is Hybrid PVP/Project Insanity.
Okay so one of my friends was able to get on my private server. But once i gave it to another person they got an error for the java. It said cannot find java. I find this wierd because im pretty sure it would work. Heres the code on my run.bat:
[code=java]@echo off TITLE Client start java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit[/code]
Btw, he also tried the 64bit run.bat and it still didnt work. I would appreciate help on this. thanks
If you want to try it out by all means download the client from this link: [url=http://uppit.com/s96qn8cje0en/Paralyze_PK_Client.rar]http://uppit.com/s96qn8cje0en/Paralyze_PK_Client.rar[/url]

item.title: [PI] Run.bat java error not solved
item.dc:creator: @Clawd Clawd
item.description:
@Clawd wrote:

ok well can someone point me towards a good client base? cause i dont want an old version of rs. i like hybrid pvp. and insidiax seems amazing, but i cant get that to work either. some problem with the cache.

Read full topic

might be gravedigging don’t know

item.description:
@Clawd wrote:

AtomicInt_:

70mb client? You’re kidding right?

is that too big? i thot it was normal size. and thats just the rar file. anwayz, i would ask for teamviewer but thats not the problem. the problem is when i giv it out so i would appreciate it if you could download it. otherwise u can check my public client on teamviewer.

item.title: [PI] Run.bat java error not solved
item.dc:creator: @Clawd Clawd
item.description:
@Clawd wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:4, topic:419425”]…
Do they even have jre?[/quote]

i met them on a popular private server called “Near Reality” so if they can run that im pretty sure the hav jre. also that cant be the problem cause 5 people are getting this problem. Can you try and get on please??

item.title: [PI] Run.bat java error not solved
item.dc:creator: @Clawd Clawd
item.description:
@Clawd wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:2, topic:419425”] @echo off javaw -Xmx300m client exit

@echo off "C:/Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m client pause [/quote]

ok so i tried that and i sent it to my friends but both of them were unable to connect. they said that the cmd thing popped up and then immediately closed. Please help me. check out whats wrong with the files.
heres the new download link:
http://up.ht/tElZKi

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Run.bat java error not solved
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

@echo off
javaw -Xmx300m client
exit
@echo off
"C:/Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m client
pause

Read full topic
